scripts.setup: rokit install && pnpm install -w && pnpm run analyze:setup
scripts.lint: pnpm exec cspell . --quiet --dot --unique --gitignore && pnpm exec biome lint . --no-errors-on-unmatched && stylua -c . --respect-ignores && pnpm run analyze && pnpm run analyze:cleanup
scripts.analyze: pnpm run analyze:setup && llsp analyze --defs=roblox.d.luau --no-strict-dm-types packages
scripts.analyze:cleanup: pnpm exec shx test -f roblox.d.luau && pnpm exec shx rm -rf roblox.d.luau
scripts.analyze:setup: pnpm exec shx test -f roblox.d.luau || curl -o roblox.d.luau https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JohnnyMorganz/luau-lsp/main/scripts/globalTypes.d.luau
